metadata.feature_description: Tests the extension point for future account settings features

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar and click on Evoq.Accounts navigation item
steps.expected: Account Settings panel opens showing the tabs-extensions div container
steps.actual: The Evoq.Accounts navigation item exists in PersonaBar but has empty data-path and data-folder-name attributes. Clicking the item does not open any panel. The tabs-extensions div is not rendered in the UI.

steps.action: Inspect DOM for tabs-extensions element using browser developer tools equivalent
steps.expected: Element with id='tabs-extensions' should be present in the DOM
steps.actual: JavaScript inspection confirmed hasTabsExtensions=false - the element does not exist in the loaded PersonaBar iframe content

issues: The Evoq.Accounts navigation item has empty data-path and data-folder-name attributes
The AccountSettings.html content containing the tabs-extensions div is not loaded in the UI
The nav item displays 'nav_Accounts' indicating missing localization resource

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check personabar-extensions CSS class is applied

steps.action: Search for personabar-extensions CSS class in the loaded PersonaBar content
steps.expected: An element with class='personabar-extensions' should be present
steps.actual: JavaScript inspection confirmed hasPersonabarExtensions=false - no element with this class exists in the loaded PersonaBar iframe content

issues: The CSS class personabar-extensions is not present because the AccountSettings.html content is not rendered

observations:
Code review confirmed AccountSettings.html contains '
' but this content is not loaded in the UI
The Evoq.Accounts navigation item exists in PersonaBar with attributes: data-module-name='Accounts', data-path='', data-folder-name='', href=''
The AccountSettingsController.cs exists as an empty placeholder class in the Components folder - this is code-level infrastructure not testable via UI
The extension point infrastructure exists in the codebase but appears to be non-functional or not properly configured in this environment
The navigation item displays 'nav_Accounts' as text instead of a localized label, indicating missing localization resources
